data.label: FlutterBoost
data.description: 新一代 Flutter-Native 混合解决方案。FlutterBoost 是一个 Flutter 插件，它可以轻松地为现有原生应用程序提供 Flutter 混合集成方案。FlutterBoost 的理念是将 Flutter 像 Webview 那样来使用。在现有应用程序中同时管理 Native 页面和 Flutter 页面并非易事。FlutterBoost 帮你处理页面的映射和跳转，你只需关心页面的名字和参数即可（通常可以是 URL）。

data.label: FlutterBoost
data.description: A next-generation Flutter-Native hybrid solution. FlutterBoost is a Flutter plugin that facilitates the integration of Flutter into existing native applications. The philosophy of FlutterBoost is to use Flutter in a manner similar to Webview. Managing both Native and Flutter pages in an existing application is not an easy task. FlutterBoost assists in handling page mapping and transitions, allowing you to focus only on the page names and parameters, which are typically URLs.
